LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Misc.FleshbeastEmergeO: The fleshmass has detached from {0} and transformed into a fleshbeast!
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Misc.ResearchNote.Lett: After examining the {0}, the {1} is now accessible. Your researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to utilize the technology.
